reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater well-made, soft, and cozy, with one noting it feels like a high-end piece.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy soft and warm
items.author: cheri flecha

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth Every Dollar!?!
items.body: I feel in love with the color of this sweater. I knew I had to have it. I kept putting it off because this is a gift for myself, but I had to buy gifts for my family for the holidays and I finally got the chance to buy it and I’m so so happy I did because it feels like cashmere, but it’s rather light and the colors are beautiful. Oh my God I am not sorry that I spent this much money and it’s not really a lot of money. It’s a lot of money for me, but I am not sorry at all for buying this! It’s beautiful. It feels like what I had would imagine Cashmere feels like. It wears true to size and it’s stitching. It’s very beautiful. Bravo well done. Be careful my second one came with this hole i’m keeping it of course because I love the sweater but be careful how it was if it was previously worn or previously bought and they just returned it and you should get some money back chances are you won’t but you should! Read more
items.author: Pline4

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and super cute!
items.body: I’m really impressed with the quality of this turtleneck sweater! It feels soft and well-made. I like to think I have a good eye for fashion, and this one definitely looks more expensive than it is. I was honestly surprised to see some negative reviews about the quality — maybe it depends on the color? I got the beige one, and it’s great. The only downside for me is that it’s not as oversized as advertised. I was expecting a looser fit. But I’m still keeping mine because it looks so good with jeans or a long jean skirt. Overall, I love it! Read more
items.author: Trina Cooper

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality!
items.body: I love this sweater. The fit and shape are oversized. The fabric and quality are great. I bought two colors and wear them a lot! My only wish is that the sleeves were longer so that I could size down, but I do have long arms. Read more
items.author: MJ

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice but fitted
items.body: Nice, soft feel and fit, but NOT chunky as pictured, more fitted than described Read more
items.author: Paulette Caruso

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful black sweater
items.body: It’s a lovely soft knit, warm without being bulky, oversized fit but I’m not drowning in it. I really like it. I will have to see how it holds up being laundered. Read more
items.author: Theresa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great sweater!
items.body: I love love love this sweater. It is flattering on with jeans and was great for those colder days. It is very stylish and comfortable and heavy. Very impressed with the quality. No pilling and a bit of stretch to it. I loved the color. It doesn’t wrinkle and it actually goes with everything. I think I need another color to add to my wardrobe! Read more
items.author: RL Miller

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Disappointment
items.body: I ordered this sweater and a medium and it was too big so I returned and re-ordered it in a small. When the small one came in, it was rolled in a plastic bag with no original tags on it and had long strands of human hair. Obviously it was not a new product so I returned it with great disappointment Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Lakeblue, Winered, Nutmeg, A-khaki, Blue, Lightbeige, Apricot, Black, Babyblue, G-armygreen, Orange, Rosered, Royal, Darkapricot. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
